EmailTemplate.subject: That Moment: a podcast about pivots, risks, and change
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JULY 13, 2017 <[[https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/that-moment/id1257838356?mt=2]]> Episode 1: "It was essentially disrupting ourselves" A new podcast where a group of diverse individuals share their personal stories of pivot, risk, and change. In the pilot episode, a Ford executive, a former FBI agent, and others discuss their pivotal moment where opportunity and uncertainty came to a boiling point. Did they seize the opportunity? Listen and Subscribe <[[https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/that-moment/id1257838356?mt=2]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/brick-and-mortar-retail-is-not-dying-the-future-of-brands-in-an-omnichannel-world-96c47a640571?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Brick and Mortar Retail is Not Dying: The Future of Brands in an OmniChannel World Brendan Wallace of Fifth Wall Ventures discusses the recent Amazon and Walmart deals, and how retail brands need to think about their positioning and physical space. Read More <[[https://builttoadapt.io/brick-and-mortar-retail-is-not-dying-the-future-of-brands-in-an-omnichannel-world-96c47a640571?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/building-cloud-foundry-on-demand-services-just-got-a-lot-easier?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Building Cloud Foundry On-Demand Services Just Got a Lot Easier The On-Demand Services SDK makes it significantly simpler and faster for ISVs to build easy-to-consume, full-featured services and make them available to Cloud Foundry operators and developers. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/building-cloud-foundry-on-demand-services-just-got-a-lot-easier?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-banner&utm_campaign=s1p-registration]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/the-monolith-retirement-1ca313786f52?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The Monolith Retirement A comic explaining what happens when monoliths retire. Check it Out <[[https://builttoadapt.io/the-monolith-retirement-1ca313786f52?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/how-to-deliver-an-event-driven-architecture?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> How to Deliver an Event-Driven Architecture An event-driven architecture transforms how you generate, process, store, and access data. The result? A more dynamic, adaptable business. This blog post looks at how Cloud Foundry gets you there. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/how-to-deliver-an-event-driven-architecture?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/cloud-native-recovery-tool-bosh-backup-restore-now-available-in-public-beta?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Cloud Foundry: The Definitive Guide Operators have a range of approaches for ensuring they can recover Cloud Foundry, apps, and data in case of a disaster. A new beta, BOSH Backup & Restore, aims to simplify this process. Therese Stowell explains.
